trans_title: 有才情的女子偏爱夜露
introduction: SYNOPSISYoon-mi and Min-wook, who married for two years, run a ranch together. The happiness is cut short when Ji-hoon, a cowherd, accidentally runs over Ji-hoon causing him sexually disabled. The tragedy destroys the couple and lands Ji-hoon in jail. After his release, Ji-hoon tries to make it up to the couple by working for them to compensate them for his mistakes but the harder he tries, Min-wook becomes more abusive. When Min-wook sees Ji-hoon and Yoon-mi work together, he becomes mentally unstable. He mistakes another couple to be his wife and Ji-hoon and shoots them with a rifle hurting them seriously. Min-wook is institutionalized and Ji-hoon and Yoon-mi realize that familial contentment and fulfillment of basic desires are two very different things. They decide to return to the way they were and Ji-hoon leaves the ranch.故事结婚两年和-MI minuk是生活在他的方式对牧场管理和淡然Jihoon牧民的粗心驾驶重伤minuk遭受那残缺的城堡事故。谁淡然家庭破碎，纪勋进监狱。我已经得到了比以往Jihoon一个更忠实于奖励和，因为他们minuk越来越歪做出-MI minuk但不满。年轻和健康与吉胡·约-MI minuk合作日益恶化的精神状态极为误导夫妻俩终于出来了，狩猎Jihoon英里，造成严重的伤害用猎枪。Minuk住进了精神病医院，和吉勋尹-MI的aeteuthan感情，并应被打破。认识到满足国内幸福和本能的需求已在距离太远，他们期待回归自我，吉勋将离开牧场。
